02 April 2014

Initial Proposal

Summary The goal of this project is to create the first open source Riecoin GPU miner. We plan on first implementing a simple serial CPU version, based on David Andersen's CPU miner. Then, we plan on parallelizing on a single machine using OpenCL. Finally, if we have time, we plan...
